com.csvanefalk.keytestgen.core.concurrency.capsules
Class AbstractCapsule

java.lang.Object
  com.csvanefalk.keytestgen.core.concurrency.capsules.AbstractCapsule
All Implemented Interfaces:
ICapsule
Direct Known Subclasses:
ClassCapsule, MethodCapsule, ModelCapsule, OracleCapsule
public abstract class AbstractCapsule
extends java.lang.Object
implements ICapsule

Capsules represent autonomous units of functionality within the KeYTestGen2 core, meant to make it easy for the system as a whole to run concurrently.

Author:
christopher

private  CapsuleController controller
           
private  boolean isTerminated
          Indicates if the capsule has been terminated.

private  boolean succeeded
          Flag to indicate whether or not the outcome of this capsules execution was succesful or not.
private  java.lang.Throwable thrownException
          Exception potentially thrown during the execution of this AbstractCapsule.
